mapper.sql: area_id, parent_id, area_name, full_name, area_type, area_code, area_desc, region, order_num, status, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from area
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from area where area_name like '%${cityName}%'

select
from area where parent_id is null

select
from area where parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 0 order by order_num,create_time asc
mapper.insert: insert into area (area_id, parent_id, area_name, full_name, area_type, area_code, area_desc, region, order_num, status, create_time) values (#{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
